title: Publisher Rocket Reviews: Unveiling the Ultimate Book Marketing Tool for KDP Authors

tactics.name: Niche Competition Analysis
tactics.description: Use Publisher Rocket to evaluate niches by competition score, monthly searches, and sales data to identify lucrative markets
steps: Analyze competition scores and estimated monthly searches
Review sales figures and pricing strategies
Check publication dates and page counts for competitiveness
caveats: Data may not reflect real-time market changes
source_quotes: 'if you were number one how much you could be making every month'

heuristics.name: Low Competition Boost
heuristics.condition: If niche has fewer than 10 competitors, prioritize it
source_quotes: 'only two competitors to be beat to get in the top ten'

claims.statement: Publisher Rocket provides one-time purchase access to niche analysis tools
source_quotes: 'it's a one-time fee to buy it'

niche_patterns.description: Target specific subgenres with demonstrated market potential and minimal competition
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Balances audience demand with achievable ranking potential
source_quotes: 'sci-fi alien Romance um what are people making here'
